title: Unfinished
description: On the island, we fought to stay alive.Back home, we'll fight to stay together.  UNFINISHED is the sequel to the smash 2018 hit UNCHARTED, an enthralling story about survival and forbidden love on a deserted island... PRAISE FOR UNCHARTED "Thoroughly enjoyable contemporary romance. Johnson ... skillfully weaves a narrative that avoids clich√©. ... The reader can't help but be captivated by Violet and Beck, their explosive chemistry, and their dramatic tale." -  PUBLISHERS WEEKLY (via BookLife) "Chemistry that lights the pages on fire." - USA TODAY HEA BLOG
author: Julie   Johnson
